content: these **crochet sour gummy worms** are the epitome of **cuteness** using plush yarn these little gummy worms are *super soft* and squishy the addition of cute eyes make it **even** better although i would argue that these little worms would look cute with *any* kind of eyes this pattern is really quick to work up and **beginner friendly** for those with basic knowledge of crocheting in the round and color changes *the worms can be made in a solid color as well if you are uncomfortable changing colors * **this pattern only uses a minuscule amount of each color ** it is a *great yarn stash buster * or way to use up left over balls of yarn you may have laying around the finished sour gummy **worm is approximately 5 tall and 1 wide ** **this pattern is free however it does not mean you can claim it as your own** please give me credit as the designer of the sour gummy worms keychain pattern **my handle is bombercrafts on all platforms** i am active on fb tiktok twitch twitter instagram etc
